alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:43PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cowley, southeastern Sedgwick, southwestern Butler and northeastern Sumner Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 343 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clearwater, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Haysville, Mulvane, Rose Hill, Clearwater, Douglass, Udall, Mcconnell Air Force Base, South Wichita, Rock, Oaklawn and Winfield City Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 2. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 30 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
